Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "...This is the Golden Vortex, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Sends message) This is Karenina. I'm in position.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Sends message) So I just have to find this antigen, right? Hey... Hello? Anyone?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Why the hell are you here? You weren't on the list of the Joint Task Force!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Grumbles) I'm not even sure if you belong to any task force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami didn't want to be left behind! I want to hang out with my friends!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Can't get you to stay away if we try.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You better help out if you're coming with me! Don't let me catch you slacking!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A large wave of mechanoid guards appears through the mirage in the distance...', 4: '2'}
